item.title: Guide to Installing Linux (for beginners)
item.description: Guide to Installing Linux (for beginners) Introduction Hello, this guide is for Linux beginners who are looking to try Linux out don’t know where to start. Below is a table of contents that outlines all the things we will be covering in this guide. Table of Contents - So what is Linux anyways? - What is a Desktop Environment? - Choosing a Distribution - So how do I install Linux? - How to install programs?

item.title: Github Pages With Hugo
item.description: This is not finished How to host Hugo site on Github Pre-requisites Github Account Git (terminal utility) How to change Directories in the terminal Make a repo with the following name [username].github.io Please note that [username] indicates your own personal username. Get your Hugo files in order and place it in a folder designated for this project Make all neccesary changes you need to make to your content, config etc.
